name: set-toggle-parameter
description: Use this task to set the value for a toggle parameter with Esquio
author: luisfraile

inputs.name: EsquioService
inputs.label: Esquio service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the esquio end point to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new service endpoint of type 'Esquio'

inputs.name: productName
inputs.label: Esquio product
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the product for the feature.

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Esquio deployment name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the deployment for the feature to rollback.

inputs.name: featureName
inputs.label: Esquio feature
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the feature to rollout.

inputs.name: toggleType
inputs.label: Esquio Toggle
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the toggle to change parameter.

inputs.name: parameterName
inputs.label: Esquio parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the name of the toggle parameter to change parameter.

inputs.name: parameterValue
inputs.label: Esquio parameter value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the value toggle parameter to change parameter.
